titles.title: A concurrent resolution honoring the life of Percy Lavon Julian, a pioneer in the field of organic chemistry and the first and only African-American chemist to be inducted into the National Academy of Sciences.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/31/2007--Introduced.
Honors the life of Percy Lavon Julian, a pioneer in the field of organic chemistry, and the first and only African American chemist to be inducted into the National Academy of Sciences.
